text: Admiral Sir Brian Thomas Brown, (31 August 1934 â€“ 27 April 2020) was a British senior Royal Navy officer. He was Second Sea Lord and Chief of Naval Personnel from 1988 to 1991. Brown was born in Fratton, Portsmouth. Brown died on 27 April 2020, aged 85.Obituary: Sir Brian Brown ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British military people Category:People from Portsmouth
